thread.section_title: Booking.com Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Booking.com | www.booking.com | 3 van 464
thread.title: Aurelien Boubennec (AurelienB)

author: Aurelien Boubennec (AurelienB)
title: Aurelien Boubennec (AurelienB)
text:
I booked a room near CDG airport for one night and the day after I could see the hotel debited two times for the same thing (slightly different amount due to exchange rate i guess).
I contacted both booking.com and the hotel ... Nobody is answering.
I will spread this bad experience with all my contacts, that is the best I can do. Very sad...
